title: Greenfield丨格林菲尔德-打造Minecraft最真实最大的现代城市！-v0.5 时隔两年再次更新
author: 夜刀神十香
txt_content:
本帖最后由 夜刀神十香 于 2018-7-14 22:14 编辑 


 欢迎来到Greenfield市！ 

Greenfield与其他城市不一样，这座城市的大部分建筑都有内饰，并且这座城市还在精心的策划更大规模。


城市的比例是1:1规模（1格=1平方米）。


这使你更像在一个真实的城市里行走，并探索它。


Greenfield的项目始于2011年8月，并且每天都在为这座城市建造更好的领域。


你在Greenfield能体验到和现实城市一样的生活，一座巨大的摩天大楼，市中心，郊区，可怜的贫民区，工业区，以及高速公路庞大的铁路和地铁线路。


城市中还有各种彩蛋等着你探索！

 展示视频及更新日志 
[bili=9212201]1[/bili]

更新日志（纯英文无汉化）：


Update V0.5 Coming Soon! : 6 days ago2/24/17Greenfield V0.5 is coming!

Whats new in this update?

10 rebuilt areas which include:
Downtown, Hunters Point, Old Georgetown (formerly Georgetown), Lincoln Port, Retail Park, Eagle Point, Georgetown (formerly Georgetown South), Riverwood, Dawson, Whitestone (formerly Seahaven) and Kennedy

5 brand new areas which include:
Longport Keys East, Richmond, Seahaven, Sunnyside, and Springfield

Updated transport system which includes:
New highways, updated roads, and a completely new subway system.

Stay tuned for a release date and more information!




0.4.6 is OUT NOW : 2 years ago2/06/15Update 0.4.5 is now up for download!


It has been a long time since an update, and we have worked long and hard on this. I would like to thank every single one of you who has downloaded our map, and/or checked out our pages.

Please give us some feedback, and tell us what you think.




All the best
- THEJESTR and the rest of the build team.




Updated Download Links : 2 years ago4/28/14I have now updated the download links with versions that include 3 maps: Overview map, Overview map with areas and warps, and a subway map.

I have also added a readme file to both downloads detailing some information related to the download and greenfield




v0.4.5 IS OUT : 2 years ago3/28/14Greenfield v0.4.5 is finally here!

Download page has been updated with the new map. Enjoy!




v 0.4.5 DATE ANNOUNCEMENT! : 2 years ago3/07/14It is time everyone!

The release date has been announced! Version 0.4.5 will be available to download from PMC on the Friday 28th of March.

As usual, an open server will also happen a week before release on the 21st!

Expect big stuff guys.




Update v0.4.5 : 3 years ago2/17/14UPDATE v 0.4.5 has been announced! More to come regarding release dates and information! Keep your eyes peeled!




UPDATE 0.4 : 3 years ago8/25/13UPDATE 0.4 is now LIVE folks!

Download here on this page and enjoy!




Q&A video : 3 years ago5/28/13Want to ask a question about Greenfield? Want to know something?
We will be making a Q&A video, with myself answering questions from you guys regarding Greenfield, what will happen in the future, and so on.
Ask your question below in the comments with the tag [Q&A]




0.3.4 is out!! : 3 years ago4/28/13So as you all can see 0.3.4 is out now!!

Changelog:
- new areas: Dawson and SeaHaven
- Massive clearence of bad buildings, and regeneration in Eaglepoint and Hunterspoint
- Some new subway track
- Many more structures around the city for you to explore

In the download I have now included the official Texture Pack, The Area Warps, and also a large overview of the city to help you guys find your way around.

Happy downloading! and let me know what you all think of the new update!




0.3.4 Announced! : 3 years ago4/09/13UPDATE 0.3.4 IS COMING SOON

Like us on Facebook for more updates, and to be the first one to find out when the new update will be released.




Texture Pack Update : 3 years ago4/03/13The greenfield official texture pack has now been updated to 1.5!

Happy Downloading!




Update 0.3.3 Release! : 4 years ago12/23/12Update 0.3.3 has now been released guys!!

The video wont come out for another days because it has been delayed, and i do not have any time to work on it over christmas!

Merry Christmas everyone!




Update 0.3.3 Release! : 4 years ago12/23/12Update 0.3.3 has now been released guys!!

The video wont come out for another days because it has been delayed, and i do not have any time to work on it over christmas!

Merry Christmas everyone!




UPDATE 0.3.3 : 4 years ago12/19/12update 0.3.3 has now got a scheduled release date

the 23rd of december! exacly a year from the release of 0.3.0 :)




Download Link Fixed : 4 years ago12/03/12There have been some issues lately with the download link.

I have hopefully solved this now, and I have added a new link! 

Please carry on letting me know if the download doesn't work

Thanks.




New download host : 4 years ago10/22/12finally got rid of that crappy sendspace download, and found a better site that will let me upload files large enough!

Happy downloading




SERVER MOVE : 4 years ago10/16/12Hey guys!

Yet another server move! This time to a server that has more slots, more power, and more RAM to help handle the large growth of the map!

The new IP is: greenfield.dyndns.biz:26265

We also have a new Dynmap adress: http://greenfield.dyndns.biz:8123




UPDATE 0.3.2 IS OUT : 4 years ago9/17/12here it is guys! the moment you have all been waiting for! Greenfield v0.3.2 is now out!!

Get downloading!

What is new:
- Brand new Downtown area
- New areas such as Olympia and Fort Franklin
- Hundreds of new buildings around the city
- New secrets and challenges around the city
+ much more




v0.3.2 is coming!! : 4 years ago9/09/12version 0.3.2 is coming on the 17th of september!

A new video and a series of screenshots have been added!

Make sure to check back here on the 17th to download the update!

What is to come:
- Brand new Downtown area
- New areas such as Olympia and Fort Franklin
- Hundreds of new buildings around the city
- New secrets and challenges around the city
+ much more




Update v0.3.2 coming soon! : 4 years ago8/29/12UPDATE 0.3.2 COMING SOON! 

What is to come:
- Brand new Downtown area
- New areas such as Olympia and Fort Franklin
- Hundreds of new buildings around the city
- New secrets and challenges around the city
+ much more




New IP and Host : 4 years ago5/07/12hey guys we have now got ourselves a host and we are finally up and running again after a long period of downtime! Here is the new ip:

greenfield.dyndns.biz:25584

and we also have a public dynmap again at:

greenfield.dyndns.biz:8000




Update #47 : 4 years ago4/27/12added a new video to the main page made by kristofferandre!

make sure to check it out it is very well done




UPDATE 0.3.1 : 4 years ago4/04/12Hello everyone!

i know it has been a long time since i have updated this project. Well here it is!

work on this project has come to a very slow progression due to server issues such as not updating properly and connection problems for other players. But those have both been resolved. Server is updated and other players can join now so the work continues!

As an apology for the long standstill i have released the map as it is right now as a mini update as of the 5th april 2012 

hop you guys enjoy it!

and as usual i am open for new builders to come and join us we need all the help we can get!

thanks

THEJESTR




New IP : 5 years ago2/29/12I am now back to hosting the server myself so there is a new IP once again! 

here it is: 188.222.145.223

make sure to check out the "How to be a part of the team" section to see how to join if you are not whitelisted.




Download Fixed : 5 years ago2/28/12There is something wrong with adfly so mediafire doesnt work properly they have announced it on their site... so i have removed the adfly for now :)

enjoy!

地图最新动态请关注：Facebook
 地图截图及渲染 

















































 地图安装 Save存档(正版用户):关闭Minecraft，在Windows开始菜单的搜索框中输入%appdata%/.minecraft，然后按下Enter（回车）按键。把从百度网盘下载回来的地图存档解压缩放到.minecraft\saves文件夹里面。

Schematics存档：这类型需要MCEdit。下载完成后解压到桌面，关闭Minecraft，双击mcedit.exe，点击下方import按钮，打开你下载的文件到你需要放的地方，最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。

 注意事项 1、未经原作者的明确书面许可，任何人不得复制、转载、摘编、使用原帖内容或本人转载内容进行商业和专业使用。
2、不能暗示此地图为您的个人作品，更不要将此地图作为您的作品再次发布！
3、您可以在原作者知情下将此地图用于您的服务器。
4、如若本贴的内容有侵犯您的版权，请联系我，在我确认属实后，会删除所有内容。
5、本转载贴纯属个人行为，只代表个人立场及观点，与MCBBS网站官方立场无关。
6、本帖最终解释权归本人所有，作品最终解释权归原作者（写上作者名字）所有。

 最后的话 
如果你喜欢这个地图，记得去官网给予其钻石、回复或订阅；
另外强烈建议海外玩家前往官网下载地址下载本地图，这也是对作者的一种支持。
若发现下载地址异常、存档损坏等问题，麻烦在下方留言告知。
如果你要载入这地图到服务器或拍视频，请记得填上作者名字及官网，感激不尽。

                                                                                     ——Y
